dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hey, are you busy right now?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: No, I have some free time. What's up?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I need your help with a programming problem.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Sure, I'll do my best to assist you.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Great! So I'm trying to implement a sorting algorithm, but I'm getting some unexpected results.

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Which sorting algorithm are you using?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Bubble sort can be inefficient for large datasets. Have you considered using a different algorithm?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I haven't thought about it. Can you suggest a better algorithm?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: You could try using quicksort or mergesort. They have better average-case time complexity.
